topics.body: Finally getting back into Jojo's Bizarre Adventure on crunchyroll and I'm starting from the beginning. One of my favorite things about this show has to be how utterly, completely despicable Dio Brando is from the word go, pretty much his first act when interacting with Jojo is to kick his dog in the mouth, and from there he goes onto a level of cartoonish villainy that is utterly delicious.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
